title: Hero Image
shortDescription: Add stylish full screen visuals above the fold.
longDescription:
## Stylish full screen visuals above the fold.

Hero Image adds a full screen image that pulls in visitors to read on.
author: Cloudflare Labs

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

backgroundImage.description: This image will resize to fit the screen.
backgroundImage.title: Background image

message.default:
# First impressions in full screen.
A summary of your content to encourage visitors to read on.
message.description: A summary of your content formatted with Markdown.
message.title: Message

navigatorBehavior.title: When the user clicks the Hero Image...
